languages.text: "Надпись на диалекте Ифрита. Она гласит: "{name} носит в груди сердце, что страсть сплела с сердцем Джай. Пусть чувство их пылает ослепительно ярко во славу Великого". Это вольное переложение самого известного стихотворения о любви с моего мира".

"It's a phrase in a dialect from Efreet. It says, '{name} carries in {mf|his|her} chest a heart that passion has woven with Jae's heart. May their affection burn blindingly bright for the glory of the Exalted One.' It is a loose translation of the most famous love poetry from my world."
languages.original_text: "Надпись на диалекте Ифрита. Она гласит: "{name} носит в груди сердце, что страсть сплела с сердцем Джай. Пусть чувство их пылает ослепительно ярко во славу Великого". Это вольное переложение самого известного стихотворения о любви с моего мира".

traits.locale_text: "It's a phrase in a dialect from Efreet. It says, '{name} carries in {mf|his|her} chest a heart that passion has woven with Jae's heart. May their affection burn blindingly bright for the glory of the Exalted One.' It is a loose translation of the most famous love poetry from my world."

"It's a phrase in a dialect from Efreet. It says, '{name} carries in {mf|his|her} chest a heart that passion has woven with Jae's heart. May their affection burn blindingly bright for the glory of the Exalted One.' It is a loose translation of the most famous love poetry from my world."

"It's a phrase in a dialect from Efreet. It says, '{name} carries in {mf|his|her} chest a heart that passion has woven with Jae's heart. May their affection burn blindingly bright for the glory of the Exalted One.' It is a loose translation of the most famous love poetry from my world."

languages.text: “这是艾弗里特的钢研，亲爱的。这句话的意思是：‘{name}胸膛中的心火热地跳动着，与婕伊的心交织在一起。在至高无上的神皇荣耀之下，愿他们的感情熊熊燃烧。’这是我们那边最流行的情诗，翻译过来大概就是这个意思。”
languages.original_text: "It's a phrase in a dialect from Efreet. It says, '{name} carries in {mf|his|her} chest a heart that passion has woven with Jae's heart. May their affection burn blindingly bright for the glory of the Exalted One.' It is a loose translation of the most famous love poetry from my world."

traits.locale_text: “这是艾弗里特的钢研，亲爱的。这句话的意思是：‘{name}胸膛中的心火热地跳动着，与婕伊的心交织在一起。在至高无上的神皇荣耀之下，愿他们的感情熊熊燃烧。’这是我们那边最流行的情诗，翻译过来大概就是这个意思。”

languages.text: 「それはイフリートの言い回しさ。 「{name}の胸には、ジェイの心と情熱が織りなす心臓がある。エグザルテッド・ワンの栄光のために、二人の愛情がまばゆく燃え上がらんことを」。これはアタシの惑星で最も有名な愛の詩の大雑把な訳だよ」
languages.original_text: "It's a phrase in a dialect from Efreet. It says, '{name} carries in {mf|his|her} chest a heart that passion has woven with Jae's heart. May their affection burn blindingly bright for the glory of the Exalted One.' It is a loose translation of the most famous love poetry from my world."

traits.locale_text: 「それはイフリートの言い回しさ。 「{name}の胸には、ジェイの心と情熱が織りなす心臓がある。エグザルテッド・ワンの栄光のために、二人の愛情がまばゆく燃え上がらんことを」。これはアタシの惑星で最も有名な愛の詩の大雑把な訳だよ」

languages.text: «Es una frase de un dialecto de Efreet. Dice: "{name} lleva en su corazón un corazón atado por la pasión al corazón de Jae. Que su afecto arda con un brillo cegador para mayor gloria del Exaltado". Es una traducción aproximada del poema de amor más famoso de mi mundo».
languages.original_text: "It's a phrase in a dialect from Efreet. It says, '{name} carries in {mf|his|her} chest a heart that passion has woven with Jae's heart. May their affection burn blindingly bright for the glory of the Exalted One.' It is a loose translation of the most famous love poetry from my world."

traits.locale_text: «Es una frase de un dialecto de Efreet. Dice: "{name} lleva en su corazón un corazón atado por la pasión al corazón de Jae. Que su afecto arda con un brillo cegador para mayor gloria del Exaltado". Es una traducción aproximada del poema de amor más famoso de mi mundo».

languages.text: « C'est une expression dans un dialecte d'Éfrit. Ça dit : "{name} porte dans sa poitrine un cœur lié à celui de Jae par la passion. Puisse leur affection brûler plus fort que tout pour la gloire de l'Exalté." Il s'agit d'une traduction approximative du plus célèbre poème d'amour de mon monde. »
languages.original_text: "It's a phrase in a dialect from Efreet. It says, '{name} carries in {mf|his|her} chest a heart that passion has woven with Jae's heart. May their affection burn blindingly bright for the glory of the Exalted One.' It is a loose translation of the most famous love poetry from my world."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une expression dans un dialecte d'Éfrit. Ça dit : "{name} porte dans sa poitrine un cœur lié à celui de Jae par la passion. Puisse leur affection brûler plus fort que tout pour la gloire de l'Exalté." Il s'agit d'une traduction approximative du plus célèbre poème d'amour de mon monde. »

languages.text: "Es ist eine Redewendung, die zu einem Dialekt auf Efreet gehört. Da steht: '{name} trägt in {mf|seiner|ihrer} Brust ein Herz, dessen Leidenschaft mit Jaes Herz verwoben ist. Möge ihre Gunst strahlend hell brennen für den Ruhm des Erhabenen.' Eine lose Übersetzung der bekanntesten Liebesdichtung auf meiner Welt."
languages.original_text: "It's a phrase in a dialect from Efreet. It says, '{name} carries in {mf|his|her} chest a heart that passion has woven with Jae's heart. May their affection burn blindingly bright for the glory of the Exalted One.' It is a loose translation of the most famous love poetry from my world."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist eine Redewendung, die zu einem Dialekt auf Efreet gehört. Da steht: '{name} trägt in {mf|seiner|ihrer} Brust ein Herz, dessen Leidenschaft mit Jaes Herz verwoben ist. Möge ihre Gunst strahlend hell brennen für den Ruhm des Erhabenen.' Eine lose Übersetzung der bekanntesten Liebesdichtung auf meiner Welt."

languages.text: "Bir İfrit lehçesine ait bir söz. Diyor ki: '{name}, göğsünde, Jae'ın kalbine bağlı, tutku dolu bir kalp taşıyor. Birbirlerine duydukları sevgi, kör edici bir parıltıyla, Görkemli'nin şanı için yansın.' Dünyamdaki en ünlü aşk şiirlerinden birinin serbest bir çevirisi."
languages.original_text: "It's a phrase in a dialect from Efreet. It says, '{name} carries in {mf|his|her} chest a heart that passion has woven with Jae's heart. May their affection burn blindingly bright for the glory of the Exalted One.' It is a loose translation of the most famous love poetry from my world."

traits.locale_text: "Bir İfrit lehçesine ait bir söz. Diyor ki: '{name}, göğsünde, Jae'ın kalbine bağlı, tutku dolu bir kalp taşıyor. Birbirlerine duydukları sevgi, kör edici bir parıltıyla, Görkemli'nin şanı için yansın.' Dünyamdaki en ünlü aşk şiirlerinden birinin serbest bir çevirisi."
